channel.title: XML on Data Literacy
channel.description: Recent content in XML on Data Literacy

item.title: XML and JSON Format Data - Formula 1 Podiums using R
item.description: A lot of data available on the web, via download but more particularly via APIâ€™s, is in XML or JSON format. These formats are not tabular like data frames or tables, but are hierarchical, serialised, and a little trickier to work with. They are not unlike the list structure in R, consisting of lists of lists and can be deeply nested. The purpose of this notebook is to import XML and JSON format data into R and transform it into data frame format to use with the regular suite of tools available in R.
